title: 76/697/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1976 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Title II of Council Directive 75/268/EEC of 28 April 1975 (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 28 July 1976  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Title II of Council Directive 75/268/EEC of 28 April 1975  (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)  (76/697/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Ministerial Decrees of 6 November 1975 and 19 March 1976 granting an annual compensatory allowance to farmers in less-favoured areas on account of permanent natural handicaps, notified by the Belgian Government on 26 April 1976, satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC and Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1976.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1.
